title: Temple of Baal in New York City
subtitle: Temporary reproductions of the Temple of Baal's arch (destroyed by ISIS in Syria) planned for New York City and London sparked inaccurate online rumors; the former was put on hold indefinitely.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Temple of Baal is being rebuilt in New York and London as an operable house of worship, with more such temples to follow.
